column1: '''''Sotheby's English Literature, History, Private Press, Children's Books and Illustrations 13 December 2007''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London), which includes a photograph and transcribed extracts from a letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to Derrick Parnum (see [[Letter to Derrick Parnum]]).
